PairOfCurves.code:
class PairOfCurves:
    def __init__(self, pointsPathA, pointsPathB, outputPath):
        import os
        dirname = os.path.dirname(__file__)

        os.system(
            "RScript %s %s %s %s" %
                ( 
                    os.environ['PIPE_RENDER'] + "pair_of_curves.R",
                    pointsPathA,
                    pointsPathB,
                    os.environ['PIPE_BASE'] + outputPath
                )
        )

        #os.remove(os.environ['PIPE_BASE'] + "Rplots.pdf")
